@gregbettinelli pcln/ebay/nflx/amzn spend as % rev 22%/20%/13%/3% respectively on "sales/marketing/ads", nflx is the great exception...
@rabois yes but eBay bought after they brokeout and were highly profitable and I'd argue that the business they buy undermines vs enhances
no consumer internet company that "bought" or "buys" its users has sustained a market cap >$10B....interesting to think about *why*?
